description: Detects the use of the PowerShell "Set-Service" cmdlet to change the startup type of a service to "disabled" or "manual"
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
false_positives: False positives may occur with troubleshooting scripts
name: Service StartupType Change Via PowerShell Set-Service
query: (((process.executable.text:"*\\powershell.exe") OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"PowerShell.EXE")) AND (process.command_line.text:"*Set\-Service*" AND process.command_line.text:"*\-StartupType*" AND process.command_line.text:("*Disabled*" OR "*Manual*")))
